mixed-citation.article-title: Taxonomic revision of the species of Stenothemus from Southwest China (Coleoptera, Cantharidae), with the descriptions of five new species

tp:treatment-sec.p: Body length (both sexes): 8.0‒ 11.5 mm ; width: 2.0‒ 2.7 mm .
The female reproductive system of this species is illustrated and described for the first time.
